byline.original: By CAROL VOGEL; Compiled by DAVE ITZKOFF

abstract: Brooklyn Museum, citing financial problems, hikes its suggested prices up to $12 for general admission and $8 for students and those age 62 and over.
snippet: Citing “financial challenges,” the Brooklyn Museum has raised its suggested admission price to $12.
lead_paragraph: Citing “financial challenges,” the Brooklyn Museum has raised its suggested admission price to $12.

headline.main: Brooklyn Museum Raises Suggested Admission Fee
headline.print_headline: Brooklyn Museum Raises Suggested Admission Fee
